channel.title: Need 562 Coders-BIG PROJECT!
channel.description:
Video Link- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lcB_vN5HI6M
*NOTE!: YOU MUST HAVE MSN AND A DROP BOX ACCOUNT!
~~~~INFO~~~~ This server will have many players due to the Advertiser(Making videos/Inviting friends) and posting this server on MoparScape and other RSPS advertising sites.
~~~~ROLES~~~~ Hoster[1/1]-Must be able to host the server.(Me) Server Coder[1/1]-Must know EVERYTHING about coding a source and a client. And I mean EVERYTHING. Client Coder[0/1]-Must be able to do everything once again... GFX Designer[0/1]-Must be able to create a Pro logo for our server. Advertiser[0/2]-Must be able to make youtube videos. We are also recruiting Admins/Mods but you must earn that.
~~~~STAFF BENEFITS~~~~
-The Coders, GFX Designer, and Advertiser will get their share of the donations. -The Administrators/Moderators will get free donator status(Along with additional commands)
~~~~APPLICATION~~~~
Which role do you want?:
What is your age?:
What country do you live in?:
Do you have any past experience? If so, tell me/show me:
Do you have anyone to back up what you're saying?:
MSN username:
Drop Box username:
Please fill out this application and send it in a PM or comment below.
*NOTE!: YOU MUST HAVE MSN AND A DROP BOX ACCOUNT! Having these accounts will make it easier to explain things.
